verses.name: Matthew 12:26
verses.text: And if Satan cast out Satan, he is divided against himself; how shall then his kingdom stand?

verses.name: Matthew 12:27
verses.text: And if I by Beelzebub cast out devils, by whom do your children cast them out? therefore they shall be your judges.

verses.name: Matthew 12:28
verses.text: But if I cast out devils by the Spirit of God, then the kingdom of God is come unto you.

verses.name: Matthew 12:29
verses.text: Or else how can one enter into a strong man’s house, and spoil his goods, except he first bind the strong man? and then he will spoil his house.
